c1.name: The Scent Remained
c1.descriptionRaw: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.
c1.description: Increases the maximum number of Rain Swords by 1.

c2.name: Rainbow Upon the Azure Sky
c2.descriptionRaw:
Extends the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3s.
Decreases the <color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro RES</color> of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.
c2.description:
Extends the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3s.
Decreases the Hydro RES of opponents hit by sword rain attacks by 15% for 4s.

c3.name: Weaver of Verses
c3.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c3.description:
Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Raincutter by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c4.name: Evilsoother
c4.descriptionRaw: Throughout the duration of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>, the DMG dealt by <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> is increased by 50%.
c4.description: Throughout the duration of Guhua Sword: Raincutter, the DMG dealt by Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen is increased by 50%.

c5.name: Embrace of Rain
c5.descriptionRaw:
Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen</color> by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.
c5.description:
Increases the Level of Guhua Sword: Fatal Rainscreen by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

c6.name: Hence, Call Them My Own Verses
c6.descriptionRaw: Activating 2 of <color=#FFD780FF>Guhua Sword: Raincutter</color>'s sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.
c6.description: Activating 2 of Guhua Sword: Raincutter's sword rain attacks greatly enhances the third sword rain attack. On hit, the third sword rain attack also regenerates 3 Energy for Xingqiu.
